name: Jane Smith
text: Logan is an exceptional engineer who consistently delivers high-quality code. Their ability to break down complex problems and communicate solutions clearly makes them an invaluable team member.

name: Mike Johnson
text: Working with Logan was a pleasure. They took ownership of critical projects and delivered results that exceeded our expectations. I would highly recommend them for any software engineering role.

name: Sarah Chen
text: Logan has a rare combination of technical excellence and strong communication skills. They always made sure to understand the business requirements before diving into implementation.
